entry.title: The Plug and Chug Developer Mentality
entry.content: A couple of weeks ago, I wrote about my reservations with trusting open source. But I think what’s even more funny is how developers often reach for the same tools no matter what project they’re working on. As soon as they work on a new project, they’ll install the same packages and libraries that they’ve used before or that everyone else in the industry is using, no matter the requirements of the project they’re working on.
